sorry for bad speed,
my advice: you should download only the patches you need and do not download any other patches. it will be faster. if you use a torrent client there will be tab files. Click right mouse button on the patch is not in need and select stop download or don't download. but just let it download the patch that you need. if you want to download all the patches, then you must be patient.
why cant i install the game? it says cannot locate the DVD-ROM. sorry for the inconvenience. im new at this.

@hannahroux: contents of this torrent is a patch / crack to make the sims 2 game can be played without the need to load the data from the original cd / dvd, not setup exe / iso file to install the full game. in this case the sims game that you already have asked for cd / dvd every time you try to run it. and all you have to do is ... go to the game installation directory, usually c:  program files  EA GAMES  The Sims 2  Ts bin. In Tsbin you will find a file called The Sims 2.exe. then go to this torrent folder, look for the same file and then copy it ,then go back to the tsbin folder paste into it. if windows asks to repalce the same file just click yes. well done, now you do not need to played the sims 2 without having to insert the original cd / dvd into the drive. do the same on the game expansion.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4806136/The.Sims.2___All.Expansions%5BWORKING%5D-Rebuild-Khaos_Industries
